name: Ripjaws
description:
This is the worst parkour game in the world. That's all I can say.

This is my first game so don't expect much. 

It is FUN though :)

Theme:

You have to climb all the bricks and kill all the enemies :) 

It has a problem though. You can't look around. I don't know why this is happening. Comment down below if  you know a solution :)
